name: Speed Golf!
description:
Speed Golf!

My submission for Mini Jam 86: Sports, with the limitation of no stopping!

In a game where par doesn't matter, see how fast you can get through the 6 levels and get your final time at the end! Remember to post your time in the comments!

TIP: On the water stages, if you let the ball come to a complete stop, it will save it's position in case it falls in the water, not sending it back to the start!

Controls

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse Click - Ready club / Swing club

Credit

Credit for assets used are included in the credits section of the game
